 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זַרְזִיר‎</span> **adjective** ==girded, girt== (compare [[BDB#Ba|Ba]]<sup>NB 206</sup>) — only construct [[Prov.30.31|Prov 30:31]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זַרְזִיר מָתְנַיִם אוֺתָֿ֑יִו‎</span> ***that which is girt in the loins***, etc., named with lion, he-goat, and king, as stately in motion. Perhaps = ***grey-hound*** [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Bö|Bö]] [[BDB#De|De]] and others, or ***war-horse*** [[BDB#Bo|Bo]] [[BDB#Ges|Ges]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] and others; [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss.]] ***cock***, Talmud ***raven***, see [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זַרְזִיר‎</span> ***starling*** (***war-horse*** only in interpretation of [[Prov.30.31|Prov 30:31]]), Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhMQAZAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAxABkAAAJ/hI+py+0Po1RhwlBNRpj2hoXfIo6aqQEbU65J+6KqzMEgHXouNdOHn6vtJibf6WUpFh/GC0oGHEqCnJiUOpsqqVjhr8vajsCnFU4nVIalMWvafB2L0l76d/1tlep5ePit5+eW99cXyFfWVngXsQMVR2LReCNZaXmJmam5yWlQAAA7">; Lexicons also <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***starling***, in Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhKwAeAIAAAP///wAAACH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAArAB4AAAKDhI+py+0PUYAzhuouXnpzfYChyHRe0o2XtH5kQ7YtMLt1icnq87poHAmeDLeg8YjMDBXFJHHJgialI2TPebxiOT8tN7sxMT23ZlVVLJOl6vTpzf58JWPY0M3M2+v8s7+/8yMYZdMFSFOjlYK4iOb4GJXTaBI202iodFVBudXp+QmKVQAAOw==">, perhaps loan-word Others derive from a √<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זרר‎</span>, see above) 

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זַרְזִיר‎</span> [[Prov.30.31|Prov 30:31]] see below III. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זוּר‎</span>.
